name: 8 Slot Invisible Bag
description: 8 Slots, Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Spiritcatcher
description: A mysteriously light and well-balanced weapon that seems malleable to your wishes. Double-click to choose what form it should take.
